messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Diploma or GED
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/23/2003 9:06:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: First of all I don t know of anyone who was ever
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/23/2003 9:06:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
First of all I don't know of anyone who was ever asked to see their high
school diploma when going for a job.<<<
The first and ONLY time I've ever been asked for my diploma was this year by
an accountability association in SC (in order to unschool, you have to
register with an accountability association and the teaching parent has to have a
high school diploma or better.). And I actually got my high school transcript,
NOT my diploma. I have NO idea where that is (I didn't frame it! <g>).

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
